name: RP-246
description:
The ship is in danger and these two RP-246s are the only ones that can repair maintain the control panels until we reach our destination.

Help them repair the malfunctioning panels. But be careful! If they are too far apart for too long they'll lose all their energy.

Move the camera with W and S. 

Select with the mouse an RP-246 and click on the control panel you want it to go to.

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/another-space-background-track
